summary: This mod makes changes to the smithing perk tree. Now, every perk is linked to the "steel smithing" perk, so you don't have to unlock all heavy/light armor perks to get the one you want.
descriptionHtml:
Hello !

This mod makes changes to the smithing perk tree. Now, every perk is linked to the "steel smithing" perk, so you don't have to unlock all heavy/light armor perks to get the one you want. The required smithing level for each perk is still the same.

I didn't create or delete any perk, so your perk tree in an existing save will automatically be updated without issue.


Incompatibilities : Any mod which modify the smithing perk tree.

Please report any issue, and endorse if you like it !
author: Kastanye
